concept.title: What Wi-Fi Routers Do
concept.shortdesc: When you're setting up a Wi-Fi router for the first time, it can be helpful to understand what routers actually do!

section.p: Wi-Fi routers are devices that maintain and manage a wireless internet connection between multiple devices and a modem. They function like traffic controllers, directing "packets" of data and moving them between the modem and your devices, and providing a more secure setup than connecting a modem directly to the internet.
